# ROS Global Solutions

> Total engineering solutions provider specializing in Oil & Gas equipment, HVAC systems, Data Center filtration, and Rhamnolipids bio-surfactants. Based in Sharjah, UAE.

## About

ROS Global Solutions FZE is an industrial engineering company providing specialized consulting and product supply solutions across multiple sectors worldwide. We deliver mission-critical products and services to the oil & gas, HVAC, data center, and biotechnology industries.

**Contact:**
- Email: inquiry@rosglobal.com
- Phone: +971 6 704 1447
- Location: 16G-01, Hamriya Free Zone, Sharjah, UAE

## Product Lines

### [Oil & Gas Equipment](https://rosglobal.com/oil-gas)
Complete oil and gas equipment solutions including:
- Field Surface Facility - Electrical systems
- Field Surface Facility - Mechanical equipment  
- Field Surface Facility - Instrumentation
- Drilling - Rig Spaces & Mud Pumps

### [HVAC Solutions](https://rosglobal.com/hvac)
Industrial-grade climate control and filtration:
- Commercial Dehumidifiers & Humidifiers
- Celdec Evaporative Cooling Pads
- HEPA Air Filtration Systems
- Gas Filtration Systems

### [Data Center Filtration](https://rosglobal.com/datacenter)
Specialized filtration for critical infrastructure:
- HEPA/ULPA Air Filtration
- Chemical Filtration (AMC Control)
- Precision Cooling Systems
- Environmental Control

### [Rhamnolipids Bio-Surfactants](https://rosglobal.com/rhamnolipids)
Exclusive MENA distributor of AGAE Technologies:
- 100% Biodegradable bio-surfactants
- Applications: Oil recovery (MEOR), Personal care, Agriculture, Environmental remediation
- Purity grades from 85% to 99%
